channel.title: Continuation of Battle Of The Bands
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Continuation of Battle Of The Bands"

item.title: Continuation of Battle Of The Bands
item.content:encoded:
From where the wiki currently ends:

Success! You rock out amongst the piles of corpses his solo creates!

Bones and Emo rock out, and afterwards, Bones doesn't want to leave! "FIND ME SOMETHING BRUTAL," he says, drooling blood and gore. Yeek.

Bones joins you!

Oh, and Three out of Four Bonus seems to be any combination of the four sound ninja, as I currently have the bonus with Flutie, The Twins and Tubby, all lvl2.

Double oh, new mission just now, probably unlocked with Bones:

Ninjutsu
Wander the Sands
You trek deep into the Outskirts, as day turns to night..
Difficulty: 17 Successes: 13

I failed it. Will keep you updated.

'Nother one:

Taijutsu
Wander the Sands
You trek deep into the Outskirts, over crumbling ruins..
Difficulty: 18 Successes: 13

Succeded, didn't get an item.

I just got this item, I'm pretty sure Sticky dropped it, but it doesn't say:
Ew, you don't want to know where that came from.
You found: Sticky Thread!
(Total number: 1)
It can't be sold and it isn't a craft item or distillable.
